identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Break the Grid.

theme.strategy: Dark-first with 'Liquid Glass' overlays. No flat colors; everything has depth via texture or blur.

buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/20 border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 backdrop-blur-md transition-all

landing.name: The Scattered Grid
landing.description: A chaotic but balanced grid of floating project thumbnails in the background, with the main chat interface centered and focused.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.description: Sidebar navigation + Main Content Area. Main area uses a bento-grid layout for widgets.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Lemonade-style' Roblox AI platform. It must feel premium, fluid, and slightly playful. Do not build a boring admin dashboard. Use the 'Scattered Grid' layout for the home page.
critical_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds. Use #09090b.
ALWAYS use backdrop-blur-xl for glass panels.
Buttons must have a subtle inner glow or shadow.
The 'New Project' button in the sidebar is the primary CTA.
Use the provided image URLs for the background project thumbnails.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
step_by_step_implementation: 1. Setup Tailwind config with the new colors and fonts.
3. Build the Sidebar with the 'Lemonade' logo and navigation.
4. Build the Home Page with the 'Scattered Grid' background and centered Chat Input.
6. Add the User Dropdown and Theme Selector.

anti_slop: Add micro-interactions to everything (hover, focus, active).
No default scrollbars - customize them to be thin and dark.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards.
